messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Space Station 13. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

All SMESs on Noharm station 13 have been recharged. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Supply Department

Cargo: Seems we've ordered doubles of our department resupply packages this month. Can we send them to you?

messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: AI Satellite Antechamber.

messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Noharm station 13, please stand-by.

The cargo shuttle should return in 5 minutes.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Commander Otis. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Giving you until 1:15 to bring any illegal equipment to security or you will be shot and arrested on site and treated as an enemy of the station for being part of the rebellion

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Attention:If this rebellion does not stop nuclear options will be used.
